May 16, 1998 D SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (Third Section)
SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (Third Section) 30 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest ebbw-vale-contest-third-section
Test Piece Contest
Sinfonietta [Horovitz]
Ebbw Vale Leisure Centre, Ebbw Vale, Blaenau Gwent, Wales, UK Best instrumentalist - soprano Tredegar Youth. 7 bands competed.
Dec. 2, 2013, 11:18 a.m. June 30, 2020, 10:32 p.m.
1 Newbridge Celynen Band W. F. Shipp
2 Ogmore Valley Silver Band D. T. Oakden
3 Oakdale Silver Band Ron Probyn
4 Tredegar Youth Band Chris Thomas
5 Cwmbran Band John Burns
6 Ystrad Mynach & District Alan Rowe
7 Glynneath Silver Band A. J. Harris
